video

you know I get a lot of people asking me
whether I carry a gun or any sort of
protection when I'm out in the woods and
the truth is I rarely do especially in
the wintertime there's really only two
situations that get me nervous about
animal encounters one is where you have
limited visibility and you can walk up
and surprise an animal and the other is
in campgrounds animals are used to
taking food from people are aggressive
and cause real problems well right now
all my food is sitting back at the
shelter unprotected and the odds of
something getting into it are really low
but if I was in a campground I would not

up on anything in the wintertime
